item.description: Based on thousands of years of philosophy and tradition, the Bagua can be used as a powerful tool of transformation. The Bagua is based on the teachings of the I Ching and can be used to balance energy both physically and metaphysically. In this hands-on workshop, Lisa will teach participants how to place the Bagua on their space and show how color symbols and the elements can help balance the environment. This is part of a 3 class series, cost is $40 per class OR $100 for all three classes if paid in advance. Call the HSCC at 603-883-1490 to sign up!

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Feng Shui ~ Understanding the Bagua (3 Class Series)
